domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
We have an aging president with multiple indices of dementia, and who struggles to spell 3-letter words— but he’s pointing to his opponent and questioning his mental acuity.

Trump will be untruthful, asinine, & vicious as he prepares for Nov. 3rd.
https://t.co/dVKeF2QzR2
